user.title: CozyLife Local Setup
user.description: Configure the CozyLife Local integration. Devices are automatically discovered via UDP broadcast and hostname scanning.

data_description.ips: Enter IP addresses of devices that may not be discovered automatically, separated by commas. Leave empty to use automatic discovery only.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll devices for state updates (10-300 seconds)
data_description.connection_timeout: Timeout for establishing device connections (1-30 seconds)
data_description.command_timeout: Timeout for sending commands to devices (1-30 seconds)
data_description.response_timeout: Timeout for waiting for device responses (1-30 seconds)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of CozyLife Local is allowed.

init.title: Manage CozyLife Settings
init.description: Currently configured: {current_count} IP address(es). Choose an action:

add_ip.title: Add IP Address
add_ip.description: Enter the IP address of the CozyLife device you want to add.

remove_ip.title: Remove IP Address
remove_ip.description: Select an IP address to remove from the configuration.

timeouts.title: Configure Timeouts & Polling
timeouts.description: Adjust timeout and polling values for device communication. Increase timeouts if you have slow-responding devices. Decrease polling interval for faster state updates (uses more network traffic).

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll devices for state updates (10-300 seconds, default: 30)
data_description.connection_timeout: Timeout for establishing device connections (1-30 seconds, default: 10)
data_description.command_timeout: Timeout for sending commands to devices (1-30 seconds, default: 5)
data_description.response_timeout: Timeout for waiting for device responses (1-30 seconds, default: 5)

error.invalid_ip: Invalid IP address format. Use format: 192.168.1.100
error.ip_already_exists: This IP address is already configured.
